page.title: 06CLOTHING (BOY'S)
page.content: My name is Darren Kierman.I have quite a number of different things to wear but I will tell you what I have on while I write.I wear cotton jeans (long trousers) which go over my underpants which are 100% combed cotton.My socks are 100% nylon which go over my ankles.My shoes are black and made of leather and rubber.My shirt is a mixture of cotton and nylon.My pullover is all wool.It goes over my shirt.At bedtime I wear pyjamas which are 100% cotton. They are in two parts: a bottom and top.I have long sleeves on my pyjamas.I wear a coat when it is cold.It goes over my pullover.
